channel.title: Object Classification on Joao Bilhim's (JB) blog
channel.description: Recent content in Object Classification on Joao Bilhim's (JB) blog

item.title: Building a Planespotting AI demo
item.description: Introduction This post is aimed at providing some additional background into the Plane Spotting Object Detection/Classification demo that I recently built and uploaded to GitHub. Latest code is available here. There is a web demo available here. The demo is composed of a website that allows you to upload the image of a plane and receive the same image with bounding boxes around the planes it detects and the airline they belong to.
